newsitem.title: USA: GOLF-WEATHER SUSPENDS PLAY IN PGA CHAMPIONSHIP.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-WEATHER SUSPENDS PLAY IN PGA CHAMPIONSHIP.

text.p: The threat of an impending thunderstorm forced a temporary suspension of play on Saturday in the third round of the PGA Championship with Davis Love and Justin Leonard tied for the lead at six under par.
Play was halted with Leonard on the 18th hole and Love about to putt on the 15th green.
They were both five strokes ahead of Lee Janzen, who was playing with Love, and Jeff Maggert, who had finished 15 holes.
